sourcesContent:
<form>
    name = "form"
    ( ngSubmit )="onSubmit()"
    #f="ngForm">

    <label for="username">Username</label>
    <input
        type="text"
        name="username"
        [(ngModel)]="form.username"
        required
        #username="ngModel" />
    
    <label for="password">Password </label>
    <input 
        type="password"
        name="password"
        [(ngModel)]="form.password"
        required
        #password="ngModel"/>
            
    <label for="firstName">First Name </label>
    <input    
        type="text"
        name="firstName"
        [(ngModel)]="form.firstName"
        required
        #password="ngModel"/>        
        
    <label for="lastName">Last Name </label>
    <input 
        type="lastName"
        name="lastName"
        [(ngModel)]="form.lastName"
        required
        #password="ngModel"/>

    <button>Submit</button>

</form>
